div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 312 Matsouki, c. 15 km. NNW of Agrinion, Aetolo-Acarnania, 1959 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Oeconomides) Contents: 134 AE Acarnanian League: 73 (as BMC pl. 27, 6-8) Oeniadae: 61 Disposition: Athens Information from M. Oeconomides One lot of 34 coins (12 Acarnania, 22 Oenidae) reached Athens in 1959 from Matsouki; another lot (61 Acarnania, 39 Oeniadae) was said to have been found at Gorgovli in the same general region c. 1960. The two would seem to be sections of the same find
